## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                       | Type      | Default     |
| ---------- | ---------- | --------------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `checked`  | `checked`  | Set checked state.                | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `disabled` | `disabled` | Disables checkbox.                | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `label`    | `label`    | Label of the checkbox.            | `string`  | `null`      |
| `required` | `required` | Shows a red asterisk after label. | `boolean` | `undefined` |


## Events

| Event            | Description                                    | Type                                     |
| ---------------- | ---------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------- |
| `checkboxChange` | Emitted when the checked property has changed. | `CustomEvent<CheckboxChangeEventDetail>` |
